程序包 com.academic_assistant.service

package com.academic_assistant.service
The com.academic_assistant.service package contains the service classes that implement the business logic of the application.

Services are used to perform operations on the data received from the controllers and to prepare it for the repositories.

  • Related Packages
    程序包
    说明
    com.academic_assistant
     
    com.academic_assistant.controller
    The com.academic_assistant.controller package contains classes that serve as controllers for managing various aspects of the system, such as courses, chat messages, and transactions.
    com.academic_assistant.entity
    The com.academic_assistant.entity package contains the entity classes that represent the data model for the application.
    com.academic_assistant.repository
    The com.academic_assistant.repository package contains the repository interfaces that provide CRUD operations for the entities.
    com.academic_assistant.util
    The com.academic_assistant.util package contains utility classes and helper methods that are used throughout the application.
    com.academic_assistant.webSocket
    The com.academic_assistant.webSocket package contains classes that manage WebSocket connections for real-time communication.
  • 类
    类
    说明
    ChatService
     
    CourseService
    This class provides services related to courses such as retrieving courses, enrolling, exiting, editing, and deleting courses, as well as searching for courses and providing course recommendations.
    PostService
     
    TransactionService
     
    UserService
    UserService handles the business logic related to user operations such as login, follow/unfollow, and email verification.
